bike.description: A6-SL Quaternary phase Aluminum, custom butted, integrated Tapered head tube with 1 1/2" lower bearing, hydroformed top and down tube, water bottle mount

components.description: A6-SL Quaternary phase custom butted Aluminum, w/Low Leverage suspended Rockers, FSR 2-position 140mm travel, Cold forged dropout with CNC'D disc mount and replaceable hanger, Sealed bearing pivots
ROCKSHOX Revelation RL Dual Air Tapered Steerer w/ 15mm Thru-Axle, 140mm Travel
Shimano SLX Hollow Tech II w/Integrated spindle, 24/32/42T
Shimano XT SGS Shadow Top normal 10sp
Shimano SLX Centerlock, 32H hubs w/15mm front thru-axle with Alex TD17 Double Wall rims
Shimano M575 Hydraulic Disc, 203/180mm Centerlock rotor
Shimano BL-M575 Hydraulic Forged Al Brake Lever
Oval M-200 15mm 5sweep Double Butted 6061 Riser Bar 31.8mm
